about_us.title: About MindForge
about_us.content:
About MindForge

MindForge is a modern online platform for learning programming from scratch. We believe that anyone can become a developer ‚Äî regardless of age, profession, or location. All you need is the right approach, support, and a comfortable learning environment. That‚Äôs exactly what we offer.

How It All Started

The story of MindForge began in 2012 with an idea to teach friends and colleagues how to code. People from all walks of life ‚Äî from accountants to teachers ‚Äî became confident developers in just a few months. We realized: it‚Äôs not only about passing knowledge, but also about inspiring. That‚Äôs how the idea of making education accessible to everyone was born.

What the Course Includes

Our core Java programming course includes:

  • Thousands of interactive tasks with automatic checks
  • Hands-on coding from day one
  • Real-world projects for your portfolio
  • Support from mentors and community members
  • Interview preparation and r√©sum√© assistance

What You'll Gain

  • Step-by-step learning from basics to advanced topics
  • Experience with Java, Spring, SQL, Git, and other technologies
  • Practical skills needed for your first job
  • Confidence in your abilities and your new profession

Our Mission

We don‚Äôt just teach you to code ‚Äî we help you change your life. MindForge is a launchpad into the world of IT. That‚Äôs why our course focuses on:

  • Maximum hands-on practice (from 500 to 1000 hours of coding)
  • Flexible online format ‚Äî study anytime
  • Support from mentors and the community
  • Accessibility ‚Äî you can start for free

Our Team

We are a team of developers, methodologists, and mentors who also once started from scratch. That‚Äôs why we understand beginners‚Äô fears and design our training so you feel supported every step of the way. For us, it‚Äôs important that the learning process is:

  • Clearly structured and easy to follow
  • Engaging and dynamic
  • Based on real-world tasks

Ready to Start?

Create a free account, choose a learning track, and take the first step toward a life-changing profession. We‚Äôll be with you every step of the way. Welcome to MindForge ‚Äî where developers are made!

privacy.content:

'Platform' means the website, application, and other services offered by the Company. 'Agreement' refers to this Privacy Policy and related Terms of Use.

The Company reserves the right to verify the information provided during registration and to deny or terminate access if the information is found to be incorrect or fraudulent.

3. Subject of the Agreement

This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which the Company collects, uses, maintains, and discloses information collected from Users. The services include educational content, tools, and communication features offered through the platform.

4. Rights and Obligations of the Company

The Company undertakes to ensure the proper functioning of the platform and protect User data to the best of its abilities. The Company reserves the right to modify or terminate services without prior notice if necessary.

The Company may send notifications to Users regarding service updates, promotional offers, and legal changes relevant to their use of the platform.

Users agree to use the platform lawfully and not to engage in any activities that may harm the platform or other users. Users must provide accurate data and update it when necessary.

Users must not share their account access with third parties and are responsible for all activities under their account.

The Company is not liable for delays caused by payment processors or third-party services.

The User agrees to use the platform at their own risk and acknowledges that the service is provided 'as is.'

9. Personal Data

The Company collects personal data such as name, email, phone number, and usage data to provide and improve services. All personal information is processed in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

Users have the right to access, modify, or delete their personal data by contacting the Company.

10. Final Provisions

This Policy, along with the Terms of Use, constitutes the entire agreement between the Company and the User. If any provision is found to be invalid, the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect.

The Company may transfer its rights and obligations under this Agreement without further notice to Users.

Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.content:
Frequently Asked Questions

Table of Contents

  • Registration and Getting Started
  • Courses and Learning Format
  • Pricing and Subscriptions
  • Mobile Version
  • Support and Community
  • Certificates and Diplomas

Registration and Getting Started

Q: How do I sign up for a course?

A: Create an account, select a course, and click 'Enroll'. The course will appear in your personal account.

Q: Do I need prior knowledge?

A: No, the courses are suitable for beginners ‚Äî you can start from scratch.

Courses and Learning Format

Q: What courses are offered?

A: Both free and paid courses are available for beginners and experienced developers.

Q: How is the learning structured?

A: Through lectures, practice with auto-checking, and real projects. Everything is online.

Pricing and Subscriptions

Q: Are there free courses?

A: Yes, we offer both free courses and paid subscriptions with additional materials.

Q: What types of subscriptions are available?

A: Monthly, semi-annual, and annual subscriptions. With auto-renewal and the option to cancel at any time.

Mobile Version

Q: Can I study on my phone?

A: Yes, the platform is optimized for mobile devices ‚Äî smartphones and tablets.

Q: Do I need to install an app?

A: No, a browser is sufficient. Everything works in the mobile version of the site.

Support and Community

Q: Is there help from mentors?

A: Yes, our team of mentors is here to help with questions and support you during your studies.

Q: Can I communicate with other students?

A: Of course! There is an active community and forums for discussion and sharing experiences.

Certificates and Diplomas

Q: Do you issue certificates after the course?

A: Yes, after completing paid courses, you receive an official certificate.

Q: Will I receive a diploma for free courses?

A: Free courses do not provide diplomas or certificates.


Return to Home

about_us.title: √úber MindForge
about_us.content:
√úber MindForge

MindForge ist eine moderne Online-Plattform, um Programmieren von Grund auf zu lernen. Wir glauben, dass jeder Entwickler werden kann ‚Äî unabh√§ngig von Alter, Beruf oder Standort. Alles, was du brauchst, ist der richtige Ansatz, Unterst√ºtzung und eine angenehme Lernumgebung. Genau das bieten wir.

Wie Alles Begann

Die Geschichte von MindForge begann 2012 mit der Idee, Freunden und Kollegen das Programmieren beizubringen. Menschen aus allen Lebensbereichen ‚Äî von Buchhaltern bis Lehrern ‚Äî wurden in nur wenigen Monaten zu selbstbewussten Entwicklern. Wir erkannten: Es geht nicht nur darum, Wissen zu vermitteln, sondern auch darum, zu inspirieren. So entstand die Idee, Bildung f√ºr alle zug√§nglich zu machen.

Was der Kurs Enth√§lt

Unser Hauptkurs zur Java-Programmierung umfasst:

  • Tausende interaktive Aufgaben mit automatischen Pr√ºfungen
  • Praktisches Programmieren ab dem ersten Tag
  • Projekte aus der Praxis f√ºr dein Portfolio
  • Unterst√ºtzung durch Mentoren und Community-Mitglieder
  • Vorbereitung auf Vorstellungsgespr√§che und Lebenslauf-Hilfe

Was Du Gewinnen Wirst

  • Schritt-f√ºr-Schritt-Lernen von den Grundlagen bis zu fortgeschrittenen Themen
  • Erfahrung mit Java, Spring, SQL, Git und anderen Technologien
  • Praktische F√§higkeiten, die du f√ºr deinen ersten Job ben√∂tigst
  • Selbstvertrauen in deine F√§higkeiten und deinen neuen Beruf

Unsere Mission

Wir bringen dir nicht nur das Programmieren bei ‚Äî wir helfen dir, dein Leben zu ver√§ndern. MindForge ist eine Startrampe in die Welt der IT. Deshalb konzentriert sich unser Kurs auf:

  • Maximale praktische √úbung (von 500 bis 1000 Stunden Programmierung)
  • Flexibles Online-Format ‚Äî lerne jederzeit
  • Unterst√ºtzung durch Mentoren und die Community
  • Zug√§nglichkeit ‚Äî du kannst kostenlos starten

Unser Team

Wir sind ein Team von Entwicklern, Methodikern und Mentoren, die auch einmal von Null angefangen haben. Deshalb verstehen wir die √Ñngste von Anf√§ngern und gestalten unsere Ausbildung so, dass du in jedem Schritt unterst√ºtzt wirst. F√ºr uns ist es wichtig, dass der Lernprozess:

  • Deutlich strukturiert und leicht nachvollziehbar ist
  • Fesselnd und dynamisch ist
  • Auf realen Aufgaben basiert

Bist Du Bereit, Zu Beginnen?

Erstelle ein kostenloses Konto, w√§hle einen Lernpfad und mache den ersten Schritt in eine lebensver√§ndernde Karriere. Wir werden dich auf jedem Schritt des Weges begleiten. Willkommen bei MindForge ‚Äî wo Entwickler gemacht werden!

about_us.title: Acerca de MindForge
about_us.content:
Acerca de MindForge

MindForge es una plataforma moderna en l√≠nea para aprender a programar desde cero. Creemos que cualquiera puede convertirse en desarrollador, independientemente de la edad, profesi√≥n o ubicaci√≥n. Todo lo que necesitas es el enfoque adecuado, apoyo y un ambiente de aprendizaje c√≥modo. Eso es exactamente lo que ofrecemos.

C√≥mo Comenz√≥ Todo

La historia de MindForge comenz√≥ en 2012 con la idea de ense√±ar a amigos y colegas a programar. Personas de todos los √°mbitos de la vida ‚Äî desde contadores hasta maestros ‚Äî se convirtieron en desarrolladores seguros en solo unos meses. Nos dimos cuenta: no se trata solo de transmitir conocimientos, sino tambi√©n de inspirar. As√≠ naci√≥ la idea de hacer la educaci√≥n accesible para todos.

Qu√© Incluye el Curso

Nuestro curso principal de programaci√≥n en Java incluye:

  • miles de tareas interactivas con chequeos autom√°ticos
  • Pr√°ctica de codificaci√≥n desde el primer d√≠a
  • Proyectos del mundo real para tu portafolio
  • Apoyo de mentores y miembros de la comunidad
  • Preparaci√≥n para entrevistas y asistencia con el curr√≠culum

Qu√© Ganar√°s

  • Aprendizaje paso a paso desde lo b√°sico hasta temas avanzados
  • Experiencia con Java, Spring, SQL, Git y otras tecnolog√≠as
  • Habilidades pr√°cticas necesarias para tu primer trabajo
  • Confianza en tus habilidades y en tu nueva profesi√≥n

Nuestra Misi√≥n

No solo te ense√±amos a programar, te ayudamos a cambiar tu vida. MindForge es una plataforma de lanzamiento al mundo de TI. Por eso, nuestro curso se centra en:

  • M√°xima pr√°ctica (de 500 a 1000 horas de codificaci√≥n)
  • Formato en l√≠nea flexible ‚Äî estudia en cualquier momento
  • Apoyo de mentores y de la comunidad
  • Accesibilidad ‚Äî puedes comenzar gratis

Nuestro Equipo

Somos un equipo de desarrolladores, metod√≥logos y mentores que tambi√©n empezaron desde cero. Por eso entendemos los miedos de los principiantes y dise√±amos nuestra formaci√≥n para que te sientas apoyado en cada paso del camino. Para nosotros, es importante que el proceso de aprendizaje sea:

  • Claramente estructurado y f√°cil de seguir
  • Interesante y din√°mico
  • Basado en tareas del mundo real

¬øListo para Comenzar?

Crea una cuenta gratuita, elige una ruta de aprendizaje y da el primer paso hacia una profesi√≥n que cambia la vida. Estaremos contigo en cada paso del camino. ¬°Bienvenido a MindForge, donde se forman los desarrolladores!

1. –í—Å—Ç—É–ø

–¶—è –õ—ñ—Ü–µ–Ω–∑–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–∞ —É–≥–æ–¥–∞ —Ä–µ–≥—É–ª—é—î –≤–∏–∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è –≤–∞–º–∏ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏ —Ç–∞ –≤—Å—ñ—Ö –Ω–∞–¥–∞–Ω–∏—Ö –Ω–∞–º–∏ –ø–æ—Å–ª—É–≥. –í–∏–∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤—É—é—á–∏ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É, –≤–∏ –ø–æ–≥–æ–¥–∂—É—î—Ç–µ—Å—è –¥–æ—Ç—Ä–∏–º—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏—Å—è –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—Ö –Ω–∏–∂—á–µ —É–º–æ–≤.

–ü–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∞ –≤–∏–∫–ª—é—á–Ω–æ –¥–ª—è –æ—Å–æ–±–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≥–æ, –Ω–µ–∫–æ–º–µ—Ä—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–æ–≥–æ –≤–∏–∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è. –ó–∞–±–æ—Ä–æ–Ω—è—î—Ç—å—Å—è:

–í—Å—ñ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∞ –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–Ω–µ –∑–∞–±–µ–∑–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–Ω—è, –∫—É—Ä—Å–∏, –¥–∏–∑–∞–π–Ω —Ç–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç –Ω–∞–ª–µ–∂–∞—Ç—å —Ä–æ–∑—Ä–æ–±–Ω–∏–∫—É –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏. –ö–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—É–≤–∞—á –æ—Ç—Ä–∏–º—É—î –æ–±–º–µ–∂–µ–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–æ –Ω–∞ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø —Ç–∞ –≤–∏–∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è —Å–µ—Ä–≤—ñ—Å—É.

–ö–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—É–≤–∞—á –Ω–µ –º–∞—î –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∞:

4. –ü—Ä–∏–ø–∏–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—è
